title: pprof script doesn't work under Windows.
body:
by **mbampo**: 
The provided pprof script under pkg\tool\[platform] isn't compatible with the windows
terminal (though it may work with cygwin).

I have developed my own workarounds and a win-compatible version (attached).

Feel free to use it freely for any purposes. A diff should highlight the
self-explanatory changes.

Cheers!
Mauro
Attachments: 1. pprof_win.pl (161991 bytes)
